metadata.title: Wholesale CASE of 10 - GOJO Supro Max Cherry Hand Cleaner-Supro Max Hand Cleaner, 2000l, Cherry
description: Quick and effective hand lotion removes tough or sticky soils and adhesives and delivers a pleasant cherry scent. nondrying formula is a unique blend of mild cleansers and scrubbers. Ideal for plant-wide use, body shops or where soil is difficult to find. Apply to dry hands then rinse. Each Supro Max Cherry hand cleaner 2000 ml. Refill is sanitary sealed and includes a cool dispensing valve. Refills are easily loaded into the GOJO Pro tdx 2000 dispenser, store, and handle. Portion control helps reduce waste.
metadata.details: {"Brand": "Gojo", "Recommended Uses For Product": "Hand", "Liquid Volume": "2000 Milliliters", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "UPC": "073852013986"}
